title: DEAR DIARY, IT’S CINDY – A Forbidden, Taboo, Older Man, Younger Woman, Pregnancy, First Time, Hot and Steamy Romance Story
description: His eyes widened and he started to speak, but I put my fingers on his lips.“No, it’s ok. I want this. I want you to take me.”Cindy always got hot when the man of the house was around, but she knew her forbidden desire was never to be. There was no way he’d take what was his. But on a long trip with him, she begins to wonder if she just might be wrong.When a freak snow storm strands them together in tight quarters, every bit of heat counts, and Cindy learns just how hot it can get.She gets the man of the house so hard he can’t hold back. He takes her tight, untried body for the first time, stretching her out and filling her up… all without protection.
author: Layla Taboo
